text: Doctor Dolittle (also known as Dr. Dolittle) is a 1967 American musical comedy movie directed by Richard Fleischer and starring Rex Harrison, Samantha Eggar, Anthony Newley, and Richard Attenborough. It was based on Leslie Bricusse from the novel series by Hugh Lofting. ==References== Category:1967 comedy movies Category:1967 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Fleischer
title: Doctor Dolittle (1967 movie)
